channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.description:
Graffit

item.title: Drain cover, 17th March
item.description:
Drain cover is not covering the drain. It's on a green space where children play so is quite dangerous

item.title: Several large potholes across crossover, 17th March
item.description:
Several large potholes across crossover with A40 Andoversford / Cheltenham and BP Andoversford Service Station

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Andoversford
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole increasing in depth, 17th March
item.description:
This pothole is on the end of a previously repaired pothole. It is getting deeper and is now causing problems to traffic especially as it is on a very busy bus route and there has been a lot of activity by heavy lorries.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 121 Caernarvon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: V large pothole, 17th March
item.description:
Very large pothole with chunks of tarmac hanging out of it! Looks like some poor soul has just hit it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A435, Cowley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 17th March
item.description:
Large potholes that are difficult to avoid on the bend
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Badgeworth Lane, Badgeworth

item.title: Pothole opposite Post Office (has returned), 16th March
item.description:
The pothole opposite Hatherley Post office that was fixed previously, has returned again.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 257 Hatherley Road, Cheltenham

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Little Lypiatt Lypiatt Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Large section of potholes on Leckhampton Road, 16th March

item.title: Just before j11a southbound middle lane, 16th March
item.description:
Large square trench…been there for weeks, getting bigger and deeper, very uneven and dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Hucclecote

item.title: 2 pothole side by side, 16th March
item.description:
This appears to be a pothole that was fixed but now 2 potholes have appeared side by side. They could cause damage to cars as you can't avoid them if traffic is coming from the other direction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Tredington Park, Tredington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole in road opposite 23 St Paul’s Road Cheltenham, 16th March
item.description:
There is a deep and growing pothole in the road outside 23 St Paul’s Road. It has been reported before and NFA-ed but has since grown

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 27 Saint Paul's Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter dumped, 16th March
item.description:
Sadly a big bag of litter inc. MacDonald's wrappers has been dumped here. Please could it be cleaned up - thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A435, Cowley

item.title: Very deep pothole, 16th March

Big chunk of tarmac missing

item.title: Road is in bits, 16th March
item.description:
The road is verging on impassable here now thanks to the poor surface. I had to wait for several cars to pass last night because I simply could not drive over this. Please, please sort this.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Elkstone
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Lots of broken bottle glass right underneath the monkey bars in the playground

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Coverack Old Reddings Road, The Reddings
